name: Sandwich Artist
description:
I created Sandwich Artist for part of my 'Game-a-Week' uni assignment, where we create a game every week, for 7 weeks. The theme for the fourth week was 'Randomness'. Which meant that we could choose any game idea we desired, however it must contain some sort of randomness. I chose to create a sandwich making game where each order is random. The aim of the game is to complete as many correct orders as possible before the timer runs out. I enjoyed making this game so i might add to it in the future if i see potential. 

Download the game and let me know what you think!

Also check out my other games on my profile!
